name: Take this Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs Quiz! Average Trivia |   Movies

questions.text: What job did the Evil Queen have her stepdaughter, Snow White, performing?
questions.explanation:
Scullery maid.

	The Evil Queen was jealous of Snow White and her beauty so she made her a scullery maid. It was while washing the palace steps that Snow White was first seen. Snow White met the prince while looking into a wishing well. She fell in love with him. Adriana Caselotti voiced the first Disney princess, Snow White. She was paid $970 dollars for her work. For being the first voice of a Disney princess, Adriana was awarded the Disney Legend in 1994.

questions.text: How did the magic mirror describe Snow White's hair to the Evil Queen?
questions.explanation:
Black as ebony.

	The movie began with the Evil Queen asking the magic mirror to tell her who the fairest of them all was. The magic mirror began to describe Snow White. The magic mirror described Snow White as having lips as red as roses, hair as black as ebony, and skin white as snow. Lucille La Verne performed the voice of the Evil Queen while Moroni Olsen voiced the magic mirror. The Evil Queen was Lucille La Verne's final role.

questions.text: When Snow White was at the wishing well, what wish did she give to the well?
questions.correct: The one she loves would find her today
options: The animals would help her clean
She would get a better position at the castle
Her stepmother would treat her better
questions.explanation:
The one she loves would find her today.

	Snow White told the animals surrounding her that an echo in the wishing well meant the wish would come true. She met the prince seconds later, but ran away from him. Harry Stockwell voiced the prince in an uncredited role.

questions.text: In an act of jealousy, the Evil Queen wanted Snow White dead. What body part of Snow White's did the Evil Queen want returned to her?
questions.explanation:
Heart.

	The Evil Queen ordered a huntsman to take Snow White into the woods and kill her. Afterward, he was to bring Snow White's heart back to the Evil Queen in a box. The huntsman started to kill Snow White, but couldn't do it. He told Snow White to run. The huntsman was voiced by Stuart Buchanan in an uncredited role.

questions.text: When the seven dwarfs are seen for the first time, they are hard at work in the mine. What stones are they mining?
questions.explanation:
Diamonds & rubies.

	The diamonds that the dwarfs mine at the end of the day are tied in a sack with the name written on it. The sack is then put into a locked vault and the key to that vault is hung up next to the door. The dwarfs sing "Heigh-Ho" on the way home with the words of the song changed to reflect when they leave for work and when they go to work. "Heigh-Ho" was performed by six of the seven dwarfs. It was written for "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" by Larry Morey.

questions.text: Who was the first dwarf to see Snow White in their bedroom when they returned from the mine?
questions.explanation:
Dopey.

	When the animals led Snow White to the dwarf's home, she (along with the forest animals) cleaned the dwarf's home. The dwarfs found Snow White taking a nap in their bedroom. Dopey got scared and ran out of the room when he saw Snow White stretching under the sheet and thought it was a monster.

questions.text: When Snow White awoke, who was the first dwarf to recognize her as a girl?
questions.explanation:
Doc.

	When Dopey described her as a monster, the other dwarfs were going to go upstairs and kill the monster. When they got to the bedroom, Doc was the dwarf who realized Snow White was a girl. The others thought she was an angel. Snow White named all the dwarfs correctly. When they found out she could cook, the dwarfs let her stay. She slept in their room while the seven dwarfs found places to sleep downstairs.

questions.text: According to the magic mirror, the Evil Queen was carrying around the organ of what animal?
questions.explanation:
Pig.

	When the magic mirror told the Evil Queen that Snow White was still the fairest of them all, he also told her that she had the heart of a pig instead of Snow White's heart. The magic mirror told the Evil Queen where she could find Snow White.

questions.text: When the Evil Queen turned herself into an old hag, what did she use to turn her hair white?
questions.explanation:
A scream of fright.

	When the Evil Queen learned she had been tricked she concocted a potion to make herself look like an old hag so she could fool Snow White. The Evil Queen used mummy dust to make herself look old, a scream of fright to turn her hair white, an old hag's cackle to make her laugh, and the black of night to darken her clothes. Then she poisoned an apple to give to Snow White.

questions.text: What kind of apple did the old hag tell Snow White the apple she picked was called?
questions.explanation:
Wishing apple.

	To get Snow White to eat the apple, the old hag told her it was known as the wishing apple. Snow White wanted her wish for the prince to find her to come true so she bit into the apple. Snow White fell into a deep sleep. The Evil Queen was killed when she fell off a cliff. The dwarfs couldn't bear to put Snow White into the ground so they put her in a glass coffin and kept her in their house. The prince heard about the princess and made his way to the house. He kissed Snow White and she woke. The prince took Snow White back to his castle where they lived happily ever after (I assume).
